item.title: Marginalization
item.author: xsxuno@outlook.com (xsxun)
item.description: 边缘概率（Marginal Probability）是某个事件发生的概率。边缘概率是这样得到的：在联合概率中，把最终结果中不需要的那些事件合并

item.description: 生成Artifact时， MANIFEST.MF should be in: src/main/resources/META_INF/ NOT in: src/main/java/META_INF/

item.title: Blog in English!

item.description: It’s time for blogging in English! I know it’s a great challenge for me, but just as my middle school English teacher said, “The best way to learn English is to use it.” Writing in English would help me think in English and ultimately improve my oral English. Anyway, nobody will care the content on this site. Shao 2019.11.12 Milan

item.title: Ti piacerebbe andare al concerto?
